lyrics.text:
‘Ē ‘oku toko lahi mai
‘A hoku ngaahi fili;
‘Oku nau tu’u takatakai,
‘Oku nau matalili.

‘Oku nau fa’a manuki mai
“Si’i Pele ‘a e ‘Otua!
Kuo li’aki he kakai,
Li’aki mei ‘olunga.”

‘Oku ou ta’etoka’i pē au,
He ko Sihova ē
‘Oku hangē ha fakaū
He potu fua pē.

Na’a ku tokoto ‘anepō
‘O mohemohe ma’u,
He ko Sihova pē na’e le’o,
Mo faka’olunga au.

Koe’uma’ā ke fakatē
Ha mano’i kakai,
‘E ‘ikai si’i te u manavahē
Ha meʻa te nau mafai

‘Oku ‘a Sātai ‘a e tokoni;
Ko ‘ene me’a ia,
Pea ‘e vave ‘ene ‘omi
Ka tau fu’u fiefia.
